name: .CERBER2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .CERBER2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: There is no known program that can restore CERBER2 files to their original state. The best options for restoring your files are to retrieve a copy of them from a recent backup or to perform a full System Restore.
